data.prayer: There are 1,367,800 people living in the county of Munger. Only about 15,046 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Munger, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Munger.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 111 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Munger, Bihar, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Munger, Bihar, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Munger, Bihar, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Aoghar people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,336,158 who are far from you in Munger, Bihar, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Munger to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Munger, Bihar, India will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

location.name: Munger
location.people_groups_list: Rajput Dikhit, Mukeri, Beg, Rajput Banaudhia, Lunia (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Rajput Dikhit (263,000), Mukeri (32,000), Beg (3,100), Rajput Banaudhia (100), Lunia (Hindu traditions) (3,164,000)
